Title: SuperModel - A Dynamic View-Model Generator
Description:
SuperModel is a dynamic, interface-based View-Model generator.

Instead of implementing INotifyPropertyChanged by hand, which can be both tedious and dangerous, SuperModel will dynamically generate an implementation of a view-model based on an interface specification.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
SuperModel is a dynamic, interface-based View-Model generator.

Instead of implementing INotifyPropertyChanged by hand, which can be both tedious and dangerous, SuperModel will dynamically generate an implementation of a view-model based on an interface specification.

http://themicrosoftreject.blogspot.com/2010/02/introducing-supermodel.html
